author: P V
text:
Tension at

temple festival

Tense moments prevailed during the Chandrachoodeshwarar temple festival when the police asked the organisers to speed up the procession citing model code of conduct. The usual practice is to take out the procession of presiding deities during night and the ceremonies continue till dawn. The police stopped the procession on Thursday. Local residents refused to budge and asked the police to tender an apology.
title: Palanquin festival witnesses stand off
